comments.content: Ironic's PXE driver doesn't use the LoopingCall mechanism as Nova's did. I just checked, and even though the pxe_deploy_timeout option is defined still, it's not used anywhere. I think we should remove that option from ironic.drivers.modules.pxe and push this up a layer, into ironic.conductor.manager, and add handling for timeouts of various kinds of tasks, not just deploy.
